text: Krishnakumar Kunnath (23 August 1968 â€“ 31 May 2022) popularly known as KK, was an Indian playback singer. He recorded many songs for movies, such as Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam, Humraaz and Om Shanti Om. Kunnath was born in New Delhi, India. His career began in 1996. ==Death== Kunnath died from cardiac arrest while performing at a hotel in Kolkata, India on 31 May 2022, aged 53. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian singers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:People from New Delhi
title: KK (singer)
